name: ARcade (VanishedKnight, Vman127, TSpinelli, ahogan3, Alexander Locke, SydJaye)
name_original: ARcade (VanishedKnight, Vman127, TSpinelli, ahogan3, Alexander Locke, SydJaye)
description:
Don't have access to popular arcade and carnival games? Bring those games anywhere you go with ARcade! An AR (Augmented Reality) mobile game featuring Skee-Ball, Basketball,  a balloon popping/duck game, darts, and Wack-A-Mole! Play the games to earn tickets and get a high score!

DISCLAIMER:  

Skee-Ball, Darts, and Wack- A -Mole are currently not functional in-game. Stick around for fixes to those games and more additions!

GAMEPLAY DISCLAIMERS:  

* This game requires an Android device that is supported by ARCore. Without ARCore the game will not function. *

* Please be sure to find a wide open space with at least 5 feet around you to make sure the AR tracks properly. *
